content.question: What did the writer’s teacher say about Chinese students in comparison to students in the United States?

choices.label: Chinese students are more highly motivated to study English than American students are to study Chinese.
Chinese students have more opportunities to practice English than American students have to practice Chinese.
Chinese students’ proficiency level in English is higher than American students’ proficiency level in Chinese.
Chinese students’ knowledge of American culture is greater than American students’ knowledge of Chinese culture.

content.answer: Chinese students’ proficiency level in English is higher than American students’ proficiency level in Chinese.

unit.text: 2: The Influence of Language and Culture on Identity

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
